content: Now you've gained favor with the king, he'll ask for your assistance in fighting the second secret boss in the Kingdom of Sahali, called Fuban. Besting Fuban will give you the Wind Vessel, which you'll want to use in this chapter.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secret_Bosses_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Secret Bosses in Chapter 2', specifically from the subsection 'Fuban'.
The content is as follows:
Now you've gained favor with the king, he'll ask for your assistance in fighting the second secret boss in the Kingdom of Sahali, called Fuban. Besting Fuban will give you the Wind Vessel, which you'll want to use in this chapter.
